CustomField.description: Checks if all requirements have been marked as complete: Attendance at all sessions = TRUE, Submitted all coursework = TRUE, Couple met with PE Facilitator = TRUE.
CustomField.formula: AND( Attendance_at_all_sessions__c = TRUE, All_feedback_forms_received__c = TRUE, Couple_Met_with_PE_Facilitator__c = TRUE )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checks if all requirements have been marked as complete: Attendance at all sessions = TRUE, Submitted all coursework = TRUE, Couple met with PE Facilitator = TRUE.
CustomField.label: All MF Requirements Complete
